title: New: Los Angeles Police Department – If I Lied
body:
Absolutely adore this sincere songwriting from **Los Angeles Police Department** on his latest tack, _If I Lied_.

With tinges of early Shins or even the Whitney debut LP from last year, If I Lied feels admirably honest with just enough of a sugar coating to remain insanely addictive. Check it out below, lifted from a self-titled album out 28 April.
